page.index.meta.title: Featured work by Pablo Romero Jarén. UI/Graphic Artist
page.index.text.whoami: As an experienced ⭐ UI designer and graphic artist 🎨 passionate about creativity 🧠, human-centered design, and design tools, I am eagerly looking forward to positively impacting society through my work. When I'm not doing that, I love to go rock climbing 🧗, running 🏃, or camping 🏕️  with Bea and Violeta.
page.index.text.contact: Right now, I'm working 🖥️ on Design Systems for Electrolux 🔌, and I'm based in Stockholm 🇸🇪 . It's a pretty cool city if you're into  🌲, cycling 🚲, and don't mind the cold ❄️, rainy weather and long months of darkness. If you're ever around and want to catch up over coffee ☕, just give me a shout! ❤️
page.index.h3.contact: Find me online where most people is:
